actions.message:
Hello everyone,

If you want to make a ticket, you must meet the requirements.

- Run `-serverify` in <#706755488276283412> (If you don't have access to it then you are fine)
- Must be in the server more the 5 minutes
- Must be 13+

actions.message:
Hey! You are about to set up a welcome message channel!
Please mention the channel you want messages to appear and add your personal welcome message. Example:
`c?set-welcome #general Welcome %member% to our server!`
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message: üí¨ Please make sure that your welcome message includes `%member%`. This will be replaced with the member who joined!
actions.name: Send Message

actions.message:
Welcome to SkyBlox Systems discord server. Before you enter into our discord, make sure to read the rules below.

SkyBlox Systems server rules:

- No any sexual songs played
- No swearing
- No racist words
- No spamming
- No riots
- Please respect all staff

After you did that, please run the command `-serverify` in <#706755488276283412>
actions.name: Add Embed Field
